name: transport, pipeline, long distance, natural gas | transport, pipeline, long distance, natural gas | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1877/documentation

This dataset describes the transport from Germany to importing countries in Europe. Leakages per 1'000 km are based on on data collected by Marcogaz by several natural gas companies..



This dataset describes the energy consumption and the emissions linked to the transport of 1 tkm German natural gas in an onshore pipeline.
category: H:Transportation and storage/49:Land transport and transport via pipelines/493:Transport via pipeline/4930:Transport via pipeline

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The composition of the gas stems from 1994, the data for energy requirements from 2001, the leakage rate from 2006.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The data for emissions and for energy requirements is based on the environmental report of a Dutch company as in the ecoinvent v2 datasets.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Long-distance gas transport onshore with average compressor station.

flow.name: transport, pipeline, long distance, natural gas
flow.category: H:Transportation and storage/49:Land transport and transport via pipelines/493:Transport via pipeline/4930:Transport via pipeline

exchanges.description: Based on information from industry experts (German and Swiss data from 2001, ecoinvent report version 2). Value from tab. 7.15 in Faist Emmengger et al. (2007) reintroduced for v3.9 to reflect that the reference product of 'natural gas, burned in gas turbine' was changed back to the fuel input (rather than the output of electricity). The amount is corrected for the difference in NCV (v2: 36.3 vs. v3.9: 36.0 MJ/m3) assumed in the supplying datasets.
